title: 399: Emergency Surgery + Kardashian Insider w/ Amanda Hirsch
itunes:title: 399: Emergency Surgery + Kardashian Insider w/ Amanda Hirsch
description:
Today The Broads are joined by Amanda Hirsch of Instagram’s “Not Skinny But Not Fat” to find out all the insider scoop about her experience with The Kardashians - but first Jess and Bekah chat about Evan’s injury and the lost but now found kitty cat. (00:19:00) Then they dive into it with Amanda - how she started covering The Kardashians, her interviews with Kim and Khloe, her time with Kourtney, their strong opinions about the Kravis wedding fashions, who wasn’t invited to the wedding, and much more!

 

**Go to Chatty Broads instagram to join us in our donation match for Moms Demand Action - https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/ 

 

AMANDA HIRSCH:

Check out her podcast here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/not-skinny-but-not-fat/id1444559244 

Follow her on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/notskinnybutnotfat/ 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

STAMPS.COM: Get a 4-week trial, plus free postage and a digital scale at STAMPS.COM with code CHATTY

STORYWORTH: Save $10 on your first purchase when you go to STORYWORTH.COM/CHATTY 

FACTOR: Go to GO.FACTOR75.COM/CHATTY120 and use code CHATTY120 to get $120 off!

OUTSCHOOL: Save $15 on your child’s first class when you go to OUTSCHOOL.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
